results.question_text: Which set lists only offices of the Aaronic Priesthood as described in Doctrine and Covenants 107?
results.correct_answer: Deacon, Teacher, Priest, Bishop

results.question_text: According to Doctrine and Covenants 13, which set best describes the keys of the Aaronic Priesthood?
results.correct_answer: The ministering of angels; the gospel of repentance; and baptism by immersion for the remission of sins

results.question_text: Who restored the Aaronic Priesthood to Joseph Smith and Oliver Cowdery, and on what date?
results.correct_answer: John the Baptist on May 15, 1829

results.question_text: Which of the following is identified in the Church's General Handbook as a possible exception in which abortion may be considered?
results.correct_answer: Pregnancy resulting from rape or incest

results.question_text: If a member faces one of the rare exceptional circumstances regarding abortion, what does the Church counsel?
results.correct_answer: Counsel with a bishop or branch president and seek confirmation through earnest prayer before deciding

results.question_text: How does the Church view elective abortion for personal or social convenience?
results.correct_answer: It is opposed by the Church and considered a serious sin; those involved may face membership restrictions or withdrawal

results.question_text: In Latter-day Saint scripture, the Book of Abraham is part of which standard work?
results.correct_answer: The Pearl of Great Price

results.question_text: Which chapters of the Book of Abraham present the Creation account that parallels Genesis?
results.correct_answer: Abraham 4–5

results.question_text: According to the Book of Abraham, from where did Abraham depart before leading his family to Haran?
results.correct_answer: Ur of the Chaldees

results.question_text: Which set best summarizes the primary promises of the Abrahamic covenant in Latter-day Saint scripture?
results.correct_answer: Numerous posterity, a land of inheritance, the gospel and priesthood, and blessing all nations

results.question_text: According to Latter-day Saint doctrine, how do individuals today become heirs of the Abrahamic covenant?
results.correct_answer: Through faith in Christ, baptism, and gospel covenants (including temple ordinances)

results.question_text: Which passage in the Pearl of Great Price explicitly links the Abrahamic covenant to bearing the ministry and Priesthood and blessing all nations?
results.correct_answer: Abraham 2:9-11

results.question_text: According to the General Handbook of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints, which statement best reflects the Church’s position on abuse?
results.correct_answer: Abuse is a serious sin that cannot be tolerated, and victims are never to be blamed.

results.question_text: When Church leaders become aware of abuse, what is identified in the General Handbook as the first priority?
results.correct_answer: Ensuring the immediate safety and well-being of those affected

results.question_text: In 'The Family: A Proclamation to the World,' what warning is given regarding those who abuse a spouse or offspring?
results.correct_answer: They will be held accountable before God.

results.question_text: According to the Church’s Addiction Recovery Program (ARP) guide, what is identified as the ultimate source of healing from addiction?
results.correct_answer: The Atonement of Jesus Christ

results.question_text: Which official Church resource provides support group meetings for individuals and families affected by addiction?
results.correct_answer: Addiction Recovery Program (ARP)

results.question_text: According to official Church teachings, which of the following is an example of a behavioral addiction the Church warns against?
results.correct_answer: Pornography use

results.question_text: According to LDS scripture and doctrine, how can those not born into the house of Israel become part of it?
results.correct_answer: By accepting the gospel and being baptized into Christ, thus becoming Abraham’s seed by covenant

results.question_text: In Church history, when did President Wilford Woodruff announce the end of the ‘law of adoption’ practice and direct members to be sealed to their own ancestors?
According to the General Handbook, when may a legally adopted child be sealed to adoptive parents in a temple?
results.correct_answer: After the legal adoption is finalized

results.question_text: According to 2 Nephi 2:11 in the Book of Mormon, which principle explains why adversity exists in mortality?
results.correct_answer: There must be opposition in all things.

results.question_text: In Doctrine and Covenants 122:7, what purpose does the Lord give for severe trials faced by Joseph Smith?
results.correct_answer: All these things shall give thee experience, and shall be for thy good.

results.question_text: According to the General Handbook, what is the intended use of fast offerings administered by bishops to address members' temporal adversity?
results.correct_answer: To provide temporal assistance to the poor and those in need under the bishop’s direction

results.question_text: According to 2 Nephi 2:27, what fundamental choice does God grant to all people?
results.correct_answer: Liberty and eternal life through the Mediator, or captivity and death according to the power of the devil

results.question_text: In Latter-day Saint doctrine, at what age are children considered accountable and commanded to be baptized, according to Doctrine and Covenants 68:27?
results.correct_answer: Eight years old

results.question_text: Which Article of Faith teaches that individuals are punished for their own sins and not for Adam’s transgression?
results.correct_answer: Second Article of Faith

results.question_text: In Latter-day Saint doctrine, what is meant by the 'Great Apostasy'?
results.correct_answer: A period after the deaths of the New Testament apostles when priesthood authority and the fullness of the gospel were lost from the earth, necessitating the Restoration

results.question_text: Which New Testament passage explicitly foretells a 'falling away' before the Second Coming, often cited by Latter-day Saints in connection with a general apostasy?
results.correct_answer: 2 Thessalonians 2:3

results.question_text: According to the General Handbook of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints, which of the following constitutes apostasy that may lead to membership restrictions or withdrawal?
results.correct_answer: Repeatedly acting in clear, open, and deliberate public opposition to the Church or its leaders

results.question_text: According to Doctrine and Covenants 107:23, what is the principal calling of the Twelve Apostles?
results.correct_answer: To be special witnesses of the name of Christ in all the world

results.question_text: In official Church practice, which groups are sustained as prophets, seers, and revelators?
results.correct_answer: The First Presidency and the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles

results.question_text: In what year was the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles first organized in this dispensation?
According to official teachings of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints, do its members consider themselves Christians who worship Jesus Christ?
results.correct_answer: Yes; they are Christians who believe Jesus Christ is the Son of God and the Savior.

results.question_text: What revealed name of the Church, given in Doctrine and Covenants 115:4, underscores its Christian identity?
results.correct_answer: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints

results.question_text: What is the subtitle added to the Book of Mormon in 1982 that emphasizes its witness of Jesus Christ?
results.correct_answer: Another Testament of Jesus Christ

results.question_text: According to Article of Faith 4, which of the following is NOT named as one of the first principles and ordinances of the Gospel?
results.correct_answer: Tithing

results.question_text: In which book of Latter-day Saint scripture are the Articles of Faith officially published?
results.correct_answer: Pearl of Great Price

results.question_text: What does Article of Faith 8 teach about the Bible?
results.correct_answer: That the Bible is the word of God as far as it is translated correctly

results.question_text: Which aspect of the Atonement of Jesus Christ unconditionally overcomes physical death for all humankind?
results.correct_answer: His Resurrection

results.question_text: According to Latter-day Saint scripture, in what setting did Jesus experience suffering so intense that He bled from every pore?
results.correct_answer: The Garden of Gethsemane

results.question_text: According to Alma 7:11–13, why did Jesus Christ take upon Himself pains, sicknesses, and infirmities?
results.correct_answer: To know according to the flesh how to succor His people

results.question_text: According to official Latter-day Saint scripture, what is the required mode of baptism?
results.correct_answer: By immersion in water

results.question_text: In the LDS Church, which is the minimum priesthood office authorized to perform baptism by immersion (with proper authorization)?
results.correct_answer: Priest (Aaronic Priesthood)

results.question_text: Which Latter-day Saint scripture explicitly teaches that baptisms for the dead are to be performed in the temple (the Lord’s house)?
results.correct_answer: Doctrine and Covenants 124

results.question_text: According to LDS scripture, where are baptisms for the dead to be performed?
results.correct_answer: In temples dedicated by proper authority

results.question_text: What is the minimum age for a Latter-day Saint to participate as a proxy in baptisms for the dead?
results.correct_answer: 12 years old

results.question_text: In Latter-day Saint belief, what determines whether a proxy baptism benefits a deceased person?
results.correct_answer: The deceased person’s acceptance of the ordinance in the spirit world

results.question_text: Which Latter-day Saint scripture explicitly declares that those who are exalted "shall be gods, even the sons of God"?
results.correct_answer: Doctrine and Covenants 76:58

results.question_text: According to Romans 8:17, what status do faithful disciples receive that undergirds the Latter-day Saint teaching of becoming like God?
results.correct_answer: Heirs of God, and joint-heirs with Christ
